body_html:
I'd like to learn how to write ops by implementing this.
I'll work based on the adding_an_op section in the docs.

Can someone give me a few pointers on where this should end up in the tensorflow source tree?
The op itself would probably be registered in core/ops/math_ops.cc.
Should I put the kernel into a new core/kernels/cumsum_op.cc file?

I'll work based on the adding_an_op section in the docs.
Can someone give me a few pointers on where this should end up in the tensorflow source tree?

body:
I'd like to learn how to write ops by implementing this.
I'll work based on the [adding_an_op](https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/0.6.0/how_tos/adding_an_op/index.html) section in the docs.

Can someone give me a few pointers on where this should end up in the tensorflow source tree?
The op itself would probably be registered in [`core/ops/math_ops.cc`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/ops/math_ops.cc).
Should I put the kernel into  a new `core/kernels/cumsum_op.cc` file?
